column3: Integer number notating male or female (1=male, 0=female)
Current smoker status (1=current smoker, 0 = not a current smoker)
Integer number notating amount of cigarettes per day
Integer number notating blood pressur medications (1=BPMeds, 2= no BPMeds)

column7: IF statement from Male column. Converted 0's to Female and 1's to Female

column6: Calculation for individual's maximum heart rate
column7: Formula: 208-0.7*HR - See references for formula identification

column3: Integer number notating diabetes or  no diabetes (1=diabetes, 2= nodiabetes)
column6: Indication of data set of origin
